short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify your school experience with the help of AI!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EZWRITE is the ultimate homework helper for students of all ages. With the power of AI, you can get answers to your school questions instantly without spending hours searching online.

Simply highlight a question on any webpage, right-click, and press "Solve question" to get the answer on the screen in seconds. EZWRITE uses advanced machine learning algorithms to provide accurate answers to a wide range of subjects, including math, science, history, and more.

EZWRITE is perfect for students aged 10-18, or any age at all, who want to save time and get better grades. The extension is easy to use and works on any website, making it a must-have for students who want to streamline their homework routine.

EZWRITE is constantly updated with the latest AI technology to ensure you get the most accurate and up-to-date answers. 

Try out EZWRITE today and see how easy work can be!

--- UPDATE 1.0.6 ---
* Text paraphrasing
* EZWrite plus
